name: Polymet
headline: AI Product Designer
description:
Polymet uses AI to help non-designers create production-ready designs and front-end code. They explain what they want or provide an image, and Polymet designs the interface.

Our customers use Polymet instead of hiring designers and save thousands of dollars every month. Even their managers can design with English instead of writing design specs.

This helps these teams move faster and cover design function on their own instead of contractors at early stages and when they start to scale their can produce a lot more design work, just like Midjourney.

founders.name: Yusuf Hilmi, Founder
founders.description: Building Polymet to help product designers and engineers ship faster with AI.

founders.name: Furkan Köseoğlu, Founder
founders.description: Building an AI that can design and code.

markdown:
raw_markdown="[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602f6fb6affbf6881250d3d_polymet.png)](https://polymet.ai/</>)
[Book a Demo](https://polymet.ai/<https:/cal.com/team/polymet/demo>)[Sign In](https://polymet.ai/<https:/app.polymet.ai>)
[Backed by![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/667f326732361016519bdc60_yc-logo.png)](https://polymet.ai/<https:/ycombinator.com/companies/polymet>)
#  AI Product Designer at your service
Design and iterate faster with AIGet the production-ready code and ship faster
[Get started](https://polymet.ai/<http:/app.polymet.ai>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/667f4e98ec0c6fb9e337ca41_video-filler.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec2a_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec2a_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec2a_transparent%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec25_app%20screen%202.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec2a_transparent%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec2a_transparent%20circle.png)
## How it works
1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec38_icon%206.svg)
#### Describe what you needor provide images
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec3d_arrow%201.svg)
2
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec34_icon%208.svg)
#### Edit and iterate on your designs
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec3e_arrow%202.svg)
3
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec33_icon%205.svg)
#### Preview and get the code
## Get the design and code for anything you build
Our tool connects seamlessly with Figma and your codebase. You can use your components with Polymet.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec50_check%20orange.svg)
###### Design with AI
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec50_check%20orange.svg)
###### Connect your codebase
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec50_check%20orange.svg)
###### Works with your existing tools
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec25_app%20screen%202.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec3b_app%20screen%203.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec3a_app%20screen%204.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec2a_transparent%20circle.png)
## Frequently asked questions
###### How can I start designing with Polymet, can I paste images?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec58_arrow.svg)
You can explain what you want in English just as you would with a designer. You can also provide sketches and multiple images to explain what you need and Polymet will design the interface for you. You can paste an image or upload by clicking the icon in the input field.
###### Can it work with my existing designs?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec58_arrow.svg)
Yes! You can copy paste images to mimic your designs to start iterating on it. We are building Figma imports and Github integration to work with your existing components and design systems. They will be available to Enterprise and then Pro customers. 
###### How does the code output look like?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec58_arrow.svg)
We provide React code with Shadcn but you can opt out of that by prompting the AI to 'design from ground up' or mention the ui kit you want to design with. If you have any problems hit us up at support@polymet.ai.Vue, Svelte, and Mobile support with React Native is coming soon!
###### How do I use Polymet with my team?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec58_arrow.svg)
You can click to your user profile and click 'Manage' to invite team members. Then you'll be able to share a project with them by clicking 'Share with team' on a project. If you have any problems hit us up at support@polymet.ai.
###### Do I need to be a designer to use it?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec58_arrow.svg)
No! We have a lot of managers and engineers with no frontend experience using Polymet to design and prototype. We have seen managers using Polymet instead of writing design specs and PRDs and just providing the prototype to their team.
###### What are the preview links?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec58_arrow.svg)
Preview links include the functional prototype of your designs. You can share them with your team or customers to run demos to see if your new user flow is working or not.
## Start your project with Polymet
Go from an idea to prototype within seconds
[Get started](https://polymet.ai/<https:/app.polymet.ai>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec3c_app%20screen%206.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ec29_orange%20circle.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6602de8bdf787c2544d8ebb1/6602f6fb6affbf6881250d3d_polymet.png)
[Privacy Policy](https://polymet.ai/<https:/app.polymet.ai/privacy-policy>)[info@polymet.ai](https://polymet.ai/<#>)

generated_description:
**Polymet: Revolutionizing Design with AI**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Polymet is blazing a trail in the design world by creating powerful tools that simplify the process for non-designers. Their mission? To serve as an AI Product Designer that enables users to generate production-ready designs and front-end code without needing a background in design.

Polymet works like this: you simply describe what you want or upload an image, and it produces a sleek interface for you. This means companies can save thousands of dollars every month by forgoing expensive design consultants. Even managers can jump in and handle design requirements using plain English, eliminating the hassle of writing detailed specs.

The beauty of Polymet is its ability to let teams scale and move quickly. As companies grow, the design workflow becomes more robust, similar to how Midjourney transformed generative design. By combining AI prowess with familiar tools like Figma, Polymet makes the design process intuitive and integrated.

In terms of team, Polymet is lean, with just two employees based in an unspecified location, yet well-supported through partnerships like their group partner, Nicolas Dessaigne. 

Polymet is not just user-friendly for designers; it's designed to be accessible for everyone—managers and developers alike can create and prototype designs with ease. What's more, you can immediately see a functional prototype and get the accompanying code ready for implementation.

If you want to dive deeper or try Polymet for yourself, check out their website at [polymet.ai](https://polymet.ai). Whether you're a startup looking to get off the ground or an established company wanting to enhance your design efficiency, Polymet is here to help you turn ideas into prototypes in seconds. 

**Join the design revolution with Polymet!**
